title: Self-healing polymer dielectric exhibiting ultrahigh capacitive energy storage performance at 250 °C
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03705G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wenhan Xu, Fei Yang, Guodong Zhao, Muchen Zhao, Lingling Liu, Qing Wang, Shixian Zhang, Guanchun Rui, Long-Qing Chen
Polymer dielectrics capable of operating at elevated temperatures are essential components in advanced electronics and electrical power systems. However, dielectric polymers generally display significantly deteriorated capacitive performance at high temperatures...
